name: Diamond knight
description:
RESUME: 

In Diamond Knight, you are the last player of a MMORPG where you need to do dungeons and collect diamonds. But be careful the AI who control the dungeons will be mad if you kill the monsters the AI made, and will retire you a lots of diamond for each monsters killed !!! Instead she will be happy if you dosn't kill her monsters and reward you with a score multiplication at the end of the run, at that time you will also know if the AI is happy, mad or angry.

CONTROL:

ZQSD or WASD or ARROW KEYS to move

MOUSE to control the sword

Try to beat my best score of 600864 diamonds !!!

(Sorry for my bad English I'm french)
